page.description: Generate a SQL Revoke Access statement.
page.syntax: SQL_Statement as C = GenerateRevokeAccessStatement as C (User as C, Resource as C, AccessType as C)

argument.name: SQL_Statement
argument.description: An add user group statement appropriate for the database.

argument.name: User
argument.description: The user that will receive the new permission.

argument.name: AccessType
argument.description: The type of permission to set.

page.discussion: The SQL::Connection::GenerateRevokeAccessStatement() method removes a permission to a resource in a database from a user.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection conn.open("{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}") ? conn.GenerateRevokeAccessStatement("Tom", "Customer", "Read") = "REVOKE Read ON Customer FROM Tom"
